= Hotkeys =
== A document of commonly used or currently used hotkeys ==

= Hotkeys =

== Openbox ==
  * Control + Super + equal |    Pkill or exec polybar
  * Super + F               |       Fullscreen app

== sxhkd ==
  * super + control + equal | toggle polybar
M   * super + control + minus | toggle tint2
  *   super + shift + equal | toggle picom
  *   super + shift + equal | toggle btop
  *             Print       | take screenshot
  *    super + Delete       | screenshot menu
  *  super + shift + Delete | Power menu
  *       Super + e         | thunar
  *               Super + w | firefox
  *               super + v | toggle pavucontrol
  *               super + g | gpick
  *          Super + Return | kitty
  *       Super + shift + e | ranger

== tmux / byobu ==
Should you even be using byobu or just go back to plain tmux? It just seems like a half decent fronteven for Tmux. Half decent at best.
  * Control + a | Prefix
  * Prefix + x  | lock-server
  * Prefix + c  | new window
  * Prefix + D  | detach
  * Prefix + n  | next window
  * Prefix + space | nextwindow
  * Prefix + p | previous window
  * Prefix + backspace | previous window
  * Prefix + A | rename window
  * Prefix + w | list windows
  * Prefix + \ | confirm before quit server
  * Prefix + k | conform before kill window
  * Prefix + l | refresh client
  * Prefix + o | next pane
  * Prefix + | | split window horizontally
  * Prefix + - | split window vertically
  * Prefix + t | show a clock
